channel.title: Changing some stuff on the client
channel.description: i whant to change the text on my client that says: ''ricscape client made by ric'' and the test in the middle: ''ricscape is loading..'' anyways to change these?

item.title: Changing some stuff on the client
item.dc:creator: @dds_spec_own dds spec own
item.description:
@dds_spec_own wrote:

heres mi compilers
mi serves:

@echo off
title stfuscape compiler
color cd
if exist “%programfiles%\Java” (call :compile “%programfiles%\Java”) else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
“%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe” http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp
:end
echo Finished!
pause
exit

mi clients:

@echo off
COLOR cd
title stfu scape Client Compiler NUB!
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
pause

Read full topic
item.source: Changing some stuff on the client

item.title: Changing some stuff on the client
item.dc:creator: @adamp40 adamp40
item.description:
@adamp40 wrote:

You simply GO on Client.java

Go onto “replace” and type RicSCape and then in the other box put your name! and then “Replace all”

You MISS a thing!
